Package tictactoe

Class Text

java.lang.Object
tictactoe.Text
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable
public class Text extends Object implements Displayable
Class to show every message and grid during the game, with color.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface tictactoe.Displayable

    ANSI_BLACK, ANSI_BLUE, ANSI_CYAN, ANSI_GREEN, ANSI_PURPLE, ANSI_RED, ANSI_RESET, ANSI_WHITE, ANSI_YELLOW
